about_the_game:
The Bewildering Basilica of the Bishop of Bobtown is a deckbuilding, tactical roguelike focusing on controlling the battlefield and getting your units close enough to the enemy commander to kill them while defending your own leaders. Summon units and wield skills to protect them to defeat your foes!

The Bishop of Bobtown has lost his mind and foul magics spread from the great Basilica. The enemies are many and you are few. Gather your allies and quell the darkness that has risen around mighty figures across the land and recruit them to your side. When you are strong enough (and when i have put it in the game) march on the Basilica itself and end this madness at its source.

Features

  • Modular Deckbuilding: Choose two heroes per run each with their own starting decks, card pools and powers to find creating huge variations between runs.

  • Semi roguelike adventures: Adventure paths feature predetermined themed enemies and powers while maintaining roguelike deckbuilding, powers and events.

  • Customisable Runs: Adventures come with many options to customise the level difficulty and desired experience helping to ensure that each run feels unique.

Upcoming Features

  • The Bewildering Basilica: The Bewildering Basilica itself will be a fully roguelike adventure containing enemies and powers from all other adventures as well as some unique to the Basilica

  • A Story: As development continues I will be adding more lore and an actual story to the game (This will be skippable if that's not your thing)
